ADMINPASSWORD.LABEL: SAP HANA System Administrator Password
ADMINPASSWORD.MINLENGTH: The password must be at least 8 characters
ADMINPASSWORD.MAXLENGTH: The password must be at most 16 characters
ADMINPASSWORD.HELP: The password must be between 8 and 16 characters

SID.LABEL: SAP HANA SID
SID.HELP:
The SAP system ID, which is the identifier for the SAP HANA system. The ID must consist of exactly three alphanumeric characters.

Only uppercase letters are allowed.

The first character must be a letter.Forbidden values :
ADC, ADD, ALL, AMD, AND, ANY, ARE, ASC, AUX, AVG, BIT, CDC, COM, CON, DBA, END, EPS, FOR, GET, GID, IBM, INT, KEY, LOG, LPT, MAP, MAX, MIN, MON, NIX, NOT, NUL, OFF, OLD, OMS, OUT, PAD, PRN, RAW, REF, ROW, SAP, SET, SGA, SHG, SID, SQL, SUM, SYS, TMP, TOP, UID, USE, USR, VAR.
SID.PATTERN: The SID is not valid, please check the help

INSTANCENUMBER.LABEL: SAP HANA Instance Number
INSTANCENUMBER.HELP: Instance number of your SAP instance, unique within your SAP environment, the instance number consists of exactly two numeric characters, from 00 to 99
INSTANCENUMBER.PATTERN: The instance number is not valid, please check the help
